instruction: Imagine you are designing a website for a law firm, what feature(s) would you include on their web page?
output: I would include a prominent tab for the firm's frequently asked questions, as well as a comprehensive overview of the firm's areas of expertise. I would also include profiles on their lawyers so potential clients can learn more about their experience and background in the field. Furthermore, I would include contact details of the firm and a comprehensive list of services they offer. Additionally, I would design a system of easily browsable case studies so potential clients can get a better idea of the outcomes of past legal cases.
